_index_types_reference.IndexFlatIP: Exact cosine similarity search (inner product with normalized vectors). Best for <100K vectors. 100% accurate, slower.
_index_types_reference.IndexFlatL2: Exact L2 (Euclidean) distance search. Best for <100K vectors. 100% accurate, slower.
_index_types_reference.IndexIVFFlat: Approximate search with inverted file index. Best for >100K vectors. Faster, slightly less accurate.
_index_types_reference.IndexHNSWFlat: Hierarchical graph-based approximate search. Best for large datasets needing speed. High memory, very fast.
_index_types_reference.IndexIVFPQ: Compressed approximate search with product quantization. Best for millions of vectors. Low memory, approximate.

_recommended_index: IndexFlatIP (exact cosine similarity, best for RAG accuracy)
